Yeah sure :) I made it by approximation since I have been making it for quite some time so you might wanna look up the exact measurements online. Mix in oats,nuts,dried berries,chocolates basically anything you want in a big bowl. Melt some butter in a pan.Once it #8217;s melted and kinda sizzling add in some brown sugar,mix it in.Let it cook a little and add in honey.Thats the caramel thing which binds it all together.Make sure you make enough.Add it to the dry ingredients,mix it well enough and scoop it out in a tin lined by foil(I buttered the foil too to make sure it doesn #8217;t stick).Press it in nicely and refrigerate for 3-4 hours.Cut it into bars and you are good to go. WRITING.TITLE: I wanna SCREAM!!!!
WRITING.TEXT: I just wanna scream so loud.I am tired of this.Feeling depressed,then anxious,then full of rage.My teeth hurt from passively clenching them too much.The only thing that gave me peace was talking to #8220;him #8221;.The one person I am not supposed to talk to.If I tell my best friend(who #8217;s like my biggest support system right now),she #8217;ll leave me too.What am I supposed to do? I hate lying to her.I won #8217;t text him again but I want to tell her that I did but I am sure she #8217;ll leave me too.Who will I be left with then? Aaaaagggggghhhg
But she told me not to text him and I have been asking her hypothetically.Like what if I did and she said then this would be over.Its really killing me not telling her.

WRITING.TITLE: The office helps me battle depression
WRITING.TEXT: I am not even sure if this is the right sub for it but the only thing that #8217;s helping me through depression is the office.Watching it or even having it in the background when I sleep calms me down.I don #8217;t feel like cutting myself or drinking.The office is the best thing in my life right now.Just wanted to let people know how this show means to me and possibly everyone on this sub :)

I know.The day I absolutely hit rock bottom,the only thing that ultimately calmed me down and made me fall asleep was the sound of Michael Scott.I am so grateful for this cause that day the only way out seemed to be killing myself.

Hey man.Please be careful with your medication.I study epilepsy and most cases brought into emergency are cause of reduced blood levels of anti epileptic drugs.I wish you all the best #128077; #127995;
You #8217;re a really pretty girl.Stay strong! Most epileptic patients respond well to medications.All the best.Hope you are seizure free soon #128077; #127995;
This makes me so happy.I hope you start doing much much better :)
I am your age and exactly in the same situation.Sometimes I get so sad I just switch off my phone.Its not like anyone is going to miss me.

Also why so many questions.Its pretty clear what I did but I don #8217;t wanna give every second person details about it especially when I pretend to be absolutely normal in front of almost everyone(they don #8217;t know I am going through something).So I have a couple of bullshit stories I keep telling people how I got these scars.Just don #8217;t ask.
